p: With Having a considerable number of people worldwide infected with COVID-19, scientists have identified a number of cases of broad-spectrum antiviral agents (BSAAs) that could serve as potential candidates for the treatment of the viral diseases (Andersen et al., 2020; Ianevski et al., 2018). Indeed, re-purposing of current approved anti-viral drugs could be a solution to treat new viral infections (Guo, 2020; Kouznetsova et al., 2014; Mercorelli et al., 2018; Xu et al., 2016).
